name: System Atom
description:
Note : This game doesn't represent Real Science

Hi Fellow devs and gamers!!

I hope like the game!!

This is System Atom for N8Jam 2021!!
This is a infinity - defence game with a twist!

You have a control over a atom, but there are incoming laser molecules to destroy the Nucleus of your Atom!!!
Use your neutrons to destroy the laser!!!

The WebGL version is live now

Thanks a lot
- Supine from Random Ideation studios
